data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Benfica with the kick-off.
Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 2, Luca Waldschmidt of Benfica smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benfica's half?
In the minute 5, Corner awarded to Benfica.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Portimonense.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Benfica in Lisbon.
In the minute 10, Portimonense needs to be cautious. Benfica have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Portimonense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Darwin Nunez gives Benfica a 1-0 lead in Lisbon.
In the minute 13, Rafa Silva with an assist there.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Throw-in Portimonense.
Tiago Martins signals a Portimonense throw-in in Benfica's half.
Luca Waldschmidt gets his shot on target but fails to score for Benfica.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Benfica.
Portimonense drives forward and Luquinha gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Darwin Nunez for Benfica gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Portimonense goal kick.
Tiago Martins awards the home team a throw-in.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 21, Free kick Portimonense.
Fabricio for the away team is judged to be offside.
Goal! Rafa Silva extends Benfica's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Portimonense at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Portimonense are coming forward and Aylton Boa Morte gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 26, Benfica's Darwin Nunez is whistled for offside at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benfica's half?
In Lisbon Portimonense's Fabricio is caught offside.
In the minute 27, In Lisbon Benfica attack through Adel Taarabt. The finish is off target, however.
Portimonense have a goal kick.
Tiago Martins awards Portimonense a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fali Cande is booked for the away team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
In the minute 32, Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Benfica.
Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Benfica.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Portimonense.
In the minute 34, Free kick Benfica.
At Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica, Willyan Rocha has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Benfica's Alex Grimaldo is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 36, Benfica's Everton breaks free at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tiago Martins signals a throw-in for Portimonense, close to Benfica's area.
In the minute 38, Benfica will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Portimonense.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Nicolas Otamendi.
Nicolas Otamendi is booked for the home team and will be suspended from the next match.
In the minute 42, Portimonense's Lucas gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Tiago Martins awards Benfica a goal kick.
Benfica's Nicolas Otamendi looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Throw-in Portimonense.
Ball goes out of play for a Benfica goal kick.
In the minute 45, At Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Tiago Martins signals a Portimonense throw-in in Benfica's half.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Benfica.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Portimonense have kicked-off the second half at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Paulo Sergio is making the team's first substitution at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica with Beto replacing Fabricio.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Fali Cande with Anderson de Oliveira da Silva.
In the minute 48, In Lisbon Portimonense attack through Luquinha. The finish is off target, however.
Benfica have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
In the minute 52, Tiago Martins awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Portimonense's Koki Anzai breaks free at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 53, Goal kick for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Free kick for Benfica in the half of Portimonense.
Fahd Moufi (Portimonense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 55, Throw-in Benfica.
So close for Benfica as Darwin Nunez's shot comes back off the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
In the minute 57, Free kick in a good position for Portimonense!
Ball goes out of play for a Benfica goal kick.
Can Portimonense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Benfica's half?
In the minute 59, Benfica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 60, Free kick Portimonense.
Luca Waldschmidt (Benfica) gets a yellow card.
Pedrinho is on a sub for Luca Waldschmidt for Benfica.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 62, Portimonense to take a throw-in in Benfica territory.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
Portimonense push forward at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica and Anderson de Oliveira da Silva gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Benfica defence.
In the minute 63, Tiago Martins waits before resuming play because Alex Grimaldo for Benfica is still down.
Benficaâ€™s Alex Grimaldo is on his feet again at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Tiago Martins signals a Benfica throw-in in Portimonense's half.
In the minute 65, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tiago Martins awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benfica's half?
In the minute 67, Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Portimonense.
Portimonense have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Julio Cesar is replacing Aylton Boa Morte for Portimonense at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Benfica.
Luquinha for Portimonense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 71, Goal kick for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 74, Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benfica drive forward but Darwin Nunez is judged offside.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 76, Beto (Portimonense) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick Portimonense.
Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Benfica.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Portimonense close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
The home team have replaced Alex Grimaldo with Franco Cervi. This is the second substitution made today by Jorge Jesus.
In the minute 79, Benfica make their third substitution with Nuno Tavares replacing Everton.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Benfica.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
Pedrinho (Benfica) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
In the minute 82, In Lisbon, Nicolas Otamendi (Benfica) misses the target with a header.
Tiago Martins awards Portimonense a goal kick.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 85, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Benfica goal kick.
Ricardo Vaz Te is replacing Dener for the away team.
In the minute 86, Henrique Gelain is on a sub for Koki Anzai for Portimonense.
Benfica pushes forward through Nuno Tavares, whose finish on goal is saved.
Tiago Martins blows against Portimonense's Julio Cesar for offside.
In the minute 88, Beto for the away team is judged to be offside.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Portimonense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Benfica.
Ricardo Vaz Te (Portimonense) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
Tiago Martins signals a Portimonense throw-in in Benfica's half.
Portimonense drive upfield and Willyan Rocha gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Benfica defender.
Portimonense's Willyan Rocha gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Tiago Martins blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
Beto (Portimonense) heads in to reduce the deficit. The score is now 2-1.
Anderson de Oliveira da Silva instrumental with a fine assist.
Adel Taarabt (Benfica) gets a yellow card.
Benfica make their fourth substitution with Andreas Samaris replacing Adel Taarabt.
Jorge Jesus (Benfica) is making a fifth substitution, with Ferro replacing Rafa Silva.
